scripts.deploy:gh-pages: git --work-tree build add --all && git --work-tree build commit -m 'gh-pages' && git push origin HEAD:gh-pages --force && git reset --hard origin/main
scripts.clean: lerna run --parallel clean && lerna clean -y && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: rm -rf build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BUILD_PATH=$(pwd)/build lerna run --parallel build
